narrative: Maya found this totally weird note in her locker with strange symbols instead of regular letters.
Maya was super curious about what it could possibly mean!

choice_points.question: How should Maya crack this mysterious code?

options.text: Show it to Sam who loves puzzles and brain teasers
Try to figure out patterns by counting and comparing symbols

consequences.text: Sam gets really excited and notices that each symbol appears exactly the same number of times as letters in Maya's name - that's the first big clue!
Carefully counting symbols reveals patterns that help Maya realize each symbol probably stands for a different letter.

continuation: Working together, they figure out each symbol matches a letter.
When decoded, the message says 'MEET ME AT THE OLD OAK TREE.'
Maya and Sam decide to bring other trusted friends for safety and support.
At the old oak tree, they discover another student who wants to start an awesome secret puzzle club for kids who love codes and brain teasers!
The mysterious note had been a clever invitation and membership test rolled into one.

reflections.question: Have you ever received a message or invitation that felt mysterious or exciting? How did it make you feel?
What kind of secret club or special group would you want to create or join?

narrative: Maya discovered a completely puzzling encrypted message hidden in her school locker - instead of normal letters, it contained a sequence of geometric symbols that looked like some kind of secret code.
The cryptographic challenge immediately sparked her analytical curiosity and desire to solve this intriguing mystery.
She knew this would require some strategic thinking to crack.

choice_points.question: This code-breaking mission requires some strategic approaches. What should Maya try?

options.text: Collaborate with Sam, whose pattern recognition skills could provide crucial insights
Apply systematic frequency analysis and symbol-counting techniques to identify patterns

consequences.text: Partnering with Sam reveals breakthrough insights when they notice the symbol distribution perfectly matches common English letter frequency patterns, providing the key to unlocking the cipher.
Methodical symbol analysis and pattern recognition work gradually reveals the substitution logic underlying the encrypted message structure.

continuation: After serious analytical work, they finally crack the code to reveal an invitation: 'MEET ME AT THE OLD OAK TREE.'
Maya decides to bring along other intellectually curious friends who could appreciate both the code-solving achievement and whatever opportunity this represents.
They plan the meeting strategically during school hours to maintain safety while satisfying curiosity.
The oak tree encounter reveals a fellow student with genuine expertise in cryptography who had designed this elaborate recruitment test.
The encrypted message had been both invitation and intellectual qualification exam rolled into one brilliant challenge - they'd been invited to join an underground puzzle society!
